abstrac: Turning ideas into results with seamless execution.
bio:
Datalogy Software is a leading digital solutions provider that has been delivering cutting-edge web, mobile, and game development services since 2007. Our team of creative professionals, based in India, has a passion for creating innovative solutions that help businesses expand their reach and boost their bottom line.

From strategic consulting to web design, application development, search engine optimization, web hosting and maintenance, graphic and print design, and game development, our comprehensive portfolio of services offers something for everyone. With expertise in technologies such as PHP, MySQL, Laravel, CakePHP, CodeIgniter, HTML, CSS, Ionic, Angular, native iOS and Android, OpenCart, WooCommerce, AWS EC2, RDS, and more, we are equipped to deliver customized solutions that meet the unique needs of each client.

Our team of experts is dedicated to helping businesses turn their ideas into practical solutions that drive success. Whether you're looking to revamp your website, launch a new mobile app, optimize your online presence, or create a gaming experience that captivates your audience, we have the skills and experience to help you achieve your goals.

At Datalogy Software, we believe in clear communication and transparent processes to ensure a smooth and successful working relationship with our clients. To facilitate this, we have established the following work terms:

Communication: Our team is available for regular communication and updates via email, chat, and call as per the client's convenience. We make sure to respond to all queries and concerns in a timely manner.

Payment Terms: Our payment terms are flexible and can be negotiated based on the scope of work and project timeline. We accept payment through secure Escrow and Wire Transfer.

Confidentiality: We understand the importance of confidentiality and assure our clients that all information shared with us will be kept strictly confidential.

Project Timeline: We make sure to complete the projects within the agreed timeline and keep our clients informed of any potential delays.

Intellectual Property: All intellectual property created as part of the project will be owned by the client.

By adhering to these work terms, we aim to build long-lasting relationships with our clients and deliver high-quality work.

abstrac: We provide the best service in industry
bio:
At DREAM COMPUTERS, creativity and professionalism comes together in intelligent design (Image Works, Jewelery Retouch, Product Retouch, Clipping Path, Background Removal, Logo Design, Corporate Identity, Brochure Design and Website Design), from traditional print and identity work, through websites, new media and advertising, we combine skilled project management with imaginative thinking.

With 5+ years of work experience in the design industry (Image Works, Jewelery Retouch, Product Retouch, Clipping Path, Background Removal, Logo Designs, Corporate Identity, Brochure Designs, Packaging Designs and Website Designs), our clients benefit from Dream Computers execellent knowledge in enhancing their sell and services. Projects range from Image Works, Background Removal, Jewelery Retouch, Product Retouch, logo design, identity development, print advertisement and product brochure to website. We work effectively and efficiently within budgets and deadlines.

We Communicate with our provider. The first step is to understand the desired outcome of the client. Whether you need Image processing, business card, logo design, corporate identity design, corporate brochure design or magazine design, each should reach the goal of highest level of marketing of your product.


Our professional graphic design team (Image Works, Jewelery Retouch, Product Retouch, Clipping Path, Background Removal, Logo Design, Corporate Identity, Brochure Design, Packaging Design and Website Design) for businesses are dedicated to meet the 100% satisfaction of the clients for web and print advertising. We specialize in providing best service to the industry.

Our power is our money back policy. If any Client after selecting us are dissatisfied with our service, we will refund the full. (*terms applied)

We have more than 75 employee in our firm

We ask client first, how they want to go for payment terms. As far as our standard terms, we require no upfront payment & all the payment upon completion & delivery of final files.

We accept payments through Elance Billing and Payment System.

Client satisfaction assured:
We offer numerous concepts and unlimited revisions (within reason) so we will revise and refine until you will be completely satisfied with your designs!

We normally use Elance PMB for communications, and we find it quite efficient specially to keep record for the complete project conversations and files. We are also available by phone, Skype, Hotmail, Yahoo or email.

Payment Method:
Escrow.

After Sales Support:
Every project is backed up with 3 months of FREE After Sales Support.

Turnaround Time:
Turnaround time for a project differs and depends on the kind of work. We assure 24 hours turn around on emails regarding development & progress status.
